m_szDocTitle: Unplugged Performance CEO Ben Schaffer (Video Interview)
m_szDocSumamry: April 13th, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   It was great fun touring Unplugged Performance on my trip to Los Angeles for the Tesla Model 3 unveiling. Whether you are familiar with Unplugged Performance or not, the videos below should be quite interesting to you. CleanTechnica & EV Obsession  got to interview Ben Schaffer, the CEO and founder of Unplugged Performance , regarding what they do, where their inspiration originates, the company makeup, the Tesla Model 3 & Model X & Model S , and more.
